author: blogs.wsj.com
title: Speech Analysis: Obama’s Legacy on Jobs, Race Relations, Terrorism, More
text:
In his farewell speech, Barack Obama urged Americans to unite to protect the nation’s democracy, as he also ran through the challenges and themes of his eight years in office. Here’s a rundown of what Mr. Obama said about the major issues that faced his presidency, including health care, national security, energy independence, race relations and […]
  In State Department Visit, Clinton Invokes Berlin Wall to Warn of Threats to Democracy
